item.title: K3s
item.description: K3s - Lightweight Kubernetes. Easy to install, half the memory, all in a binary of less than 100 MB.

item.title: kubeclt
item.description: Kubernetes provides a command line tool kubectl for communicating with a Kubernetes cluster’s control plane, using the Kubernetes API.
